<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Lamia Matriarch](/Monsters.aspx?ID=278)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The brilliant and powerful lamia matriarchs possess boundless ambition, always seeking to bring more people and territory into the clutches of their kind. Consequently, the become rulers of other lamia. For all their cruelty toward other creatures, they’re fierce protectors of other lamia, and consequently they quickly come to rule cults or warbands. Regardless of the lamia’s gender, these ascended lamias are always known as matriarchs. Rather than leonine limbs, a lamia matriarch’s lower body is formed in the winding coils of a giant snake. They’re also set apart by the occult power they pursue, and some have even have grand designs to break the animalistic curse that transformed them. However, every attempt so far has led to the matriarch’s fall.

</column>

<title level="2" right="Creature 8">[Lamia Matriarch](/Monsters.aspx?ID=278)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Beast" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=20" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 217</row>

**Perception** +15; darkvision

**Languages**
[Abyssal](/Languages.aspx?ID=12), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +18, [Cult Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +15, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +20, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +20, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +18, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +17, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +16, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +13

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +4

**Con** +3

**Int** +3

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +6
</row>

**Items**
_+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [scimitar](/Weapons.aspx?ID=38)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 27 

**Fort** +13 

**Ref** +18 

**Will** +17 

+1 status to all saves vs. magic
</row>

**HP** 135

**Immunities**
controlled

**Resistances**
mental 10

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, climb 30 feet, swim 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_scimitar_ +19 ([forceful +2](/Traits.aspx?ID=180), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 2d6+10 slashing

**Occult Spontaneous Spells** DC 28
- **Cantrips (3rd)**
[Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Prestidigitation](/Spells.aspx?ID=229), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246)
- **1st**
[Bless](/Spells.aspx?ID=25), [Magic Missile](/Spells.aspx?ID=180), [Phantom Pain](/Spells.aspx?ID=220), [Soothe](/Spells.aspx?ID=291) (4 slots)
- **2nd**
[Blur](/Spells.aspx?ID=28), [Death Knell](/Spells.aspx?ID=63), [Illusory Creature](/Spells.aspx?ID=158), [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) (4 slots)
- **3rd**
[Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Enthrall](/Spells.aspx?ID=104), [Haste](/Spells.aspx?ID=147), [Mind Reading](/Spells.aspx?ID=194) (4 slots)

**Occult Innate Spells** DC 28
- **1st**
[Ventriloquism](/Spells.aspx?ID=356) (at will)
- **2nd**
[Illusory Disguise](/Spells.aspx?ID=159) (at will), [Illusory Object](/Spells.aspx?ID=160) (at will), [Mirror Image](/Spells.aspx?ID=197)
- **3rd**
[Sleep](/Spells.aspx?ID=288)
- **4th**
[Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34) (x3), [Suggestion](/Spells.aspx?ID=315) (x3)

**[Change Shape](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=8)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) The lamia matriarch can take on the appearance of a Medium humanoid. This doesn’t change their Speed or their attack and damage modifiers with their Strikes, but it does prevent them from using their cursed touch. Each lamia matriarch has a fixed humanoid form—they cannot adopt a different appearance each time they use this ability, and the appearance resembles that of their upper torso when in their true form.

**Dervish Strike** <actions string="Three Actions" />  The lamia matriarch makes a scimitar attack against each enemy within reach. Each attack counts toward their multiple attack penalty, but the penalty does not increase until after all the attacks. The first enemy she damages is subject to matriarch’s caress.

**Matriarch's Caress** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Curse](/Traits.aspx?ID=38), [Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) The lamia touches a creature, who must succeed at a DC 28 Will save or become [stupefied 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) ([stupefied 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) if critically failed). If the target fails additional saves against this ability, the condition value increases by 1 if failed or 2 if critically failed (to a maximum of stupefied 4). This condition value decreases by 1 every 24 hours.

</column>
